title: Disconcerting from League Of Legend Game Every Single time
body: I have been Disconcerting from every single LEAGUE OF LEGEND GAME PLEASE RIOT FIX THIS ITS NOT MY NET AT ALL WHENEVER IM IN GAME I GET ON INTERCONNECTING SCREEN EVERY FEW SECONDS AND MY NET GOES TO 1 BAR THEN WHEN I LEAVE GAME MY INTERNET BAR GOES TO 5 THIS IS NOT MY NET FAULT BECAUSE IT USE TO RUNE LEAGUE FINE BEEN HAPPENING SINCE THIS PATCH

replies.body:
Hey there,

This definitely does sound like a problem on your end, could you please do the following for me.

* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text.
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/).
* Post back with a link to your WinMTR results (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this) and a link to your ICSI netalyzr results.
